articles.title: NASA chief calls for reported Musk-Putin talks to be investigated - The Hill
articles.description: NASA Administrator Bill Nelson called for The Wall Street Journal’s recent report on “secret” conversations between tech billionaire Elon Musk and Russian President Vladimir Putin to be investigated.  Nelson first emphasized that NASA is “non-partisan politic…

articles.author: Perry Stein, Trisha Thadani, Amy B Wang
articles.title: Elon Musk’s pro-Trump PAC awards more $1 million prizes despite DOJ warning - The Washington Post
articles.description: The Justice Department had sent a letter to the tech billionaire’s political group warning that its contest awarding voters $1 million for signing a petition could run afoul of election laws.
articles.content: Tech billionaire Elon Musks pro-Trump political group awarded two additional $1 million prizes to swing-state voters Thursday night, despite warnings from the Justice Department that the daily giveaw… [+264 chars]
